(await token.balanceOf(user1.address)).toString();
await token.transfer(user1.address, ethers.utils.parseEther("100"));
await token.symbol();
await token.name();
const token = await ethers.getContractAt("UniswapLikeToken", "0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3");
const [owner, user1] = await ethers.getSigners();
.exit
(await token.balanceOf(user1.address)).toString();
await token.transfer(user1.address, ethers.utils.parseEther("100"));
await token.name();
const token = await ethers.getContractAt("UniswapLikeToken", "DIRECCION_DEL_CONTRATO");
const [owner, user1] = await ethers.getSigners();
